text: Poets who wrote much of their poetry in the Russian language. * Mikhail Lomonosov (d. 1765) * Alexander Pushkin (d. 1837) * Mikhail Lermontov (d. 1841) * Fyodor Tyutchev (d. 1873) * Ivan title: List of Russian-language poets
